vr_projects.name: Religious Landscape at Carrawburgh
vr_projects.description: How can landscape and sensory archaeology help understand the relationship between the religious shrines and the spring at Carrawburgh? Was it the landscape or the troop stationed that left such an important religious footprint? How can 3D modelling be used as a tool to augment sensory and landscape archaeology?
